attributes.additional_details: my nephew paul towers has been in an india prison now for over 8 months.he was supposed to have a hearing on the 12th off june but the prosucuter never even turd up so it was supposed to be yesterday the 16th but now its been put back now till the 24 of june.would someone tell me what is going on as he was only doing his job.i want the goverment to get him out of there,and get him home
